title: Max is back in the 2025 championship: F1 GP reports
summary: Max Verstappen’s hopes were not high for his home track of Zandvoort. It’s exactly the sort of medium-speed, long-corner layout which so rewards the McLaren and hurts the Red Bull.…

qa_pairs.question: Which driver is highlighted as having concerns about performance at the Zandvoort circuit?
Which team is noted to perform well on medium-speed, long-corner layouts like Zandvoort?
What type of circuit layout is Zandvoort characterized as?
